DOC.brief_summary: This study examine whether computer task improve memory cognitive function among patient receive inpatient treatment substance use disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Training Inpatient Treatment Substance Use Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: Participants complete cognitive training session regular basis inpatient treatment . Alternate version computer task compare randomized design . Primary secondary outcome consist change cognitive performance training period .
